snippet.title: Slender: The Arrival VR - TERRIFYING Gameplay Teaser | FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
A petrifying look at gameplay from Slender: The Arrival VR, a first-person psychological survival horror game coming to Steam, PS VR2 and Meta Quest. The teaser also reveals the release date of May 13th.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #slender #slendervr #gdc

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
